channel.title: My problems with surajd's wood smasher (please anyone reply) i am in need!
channel.description:
i tried surajds wood smasher but it didnt work for me but som1 told me that it work for them so, here is what i get when i run the script
firstly when doing the setup i dont know what to put in location or skill.
and when i click 'ok' SCAR says
getting axe and handle colors... Axe colors: 16777215 16777215 16777215 handle colors: 16777215 next player
its at this point SCAR does nothing!!
please help me thankyou

item.title: My problems with surajd's wood smasher (please anyone reply) i am in need!
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

I can’t think of anything else to help…

Sorry I couldn’t fix your problem man, but if you are having any more scripting problems be sure to post them here. Me, or someone else will help you…

The only possible Errors you could be getting now that I can think of are:
-HowManyDrops is set to 0.
-Your starting the script logged out.

But we already went through both of them, and it didn’t help…

Try Re-downloading the script?

P.S. You are not wasting my time. I enjoy helping people with SCAR.

Again, sorry I couldn’t fix your problem,
Cheesehunk.

Read full topic

item.source: My problems with surajd's wood smasher (please anyone reply) i am in need!

item.title: My problems with surajd's wood smasher (please anyone reply) i am in need!
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Alright, I wil give you a detailed explanation of what the script does, and why you might be getting a problem.

The script starts off by setting all the counters to 0.
It then disguises SCAR as ‘NotePad,’ and Sets up SRL.
Next the script finds the axe colors (which it did for you.)

The script then starts a Procedure called the MainLoop; The first like in the Main loop is if (Not (LoggedIn)) then break; which will break out of the loop if you are not logged in, so you MUST start logged in.

Then the script starts a Procedure called SetupPlayer; The first line of SetupPlayer; is NextPlayer(true);.

Try replacing your SetupPlayer; procedure with this:

Procedure SetupPlayer; begin AxeColors; Wait( 2122 + Random( 100 - 5 * 2 )); PerfectNorth; SetChat('hide', 1); SetChat('off', 2); SetChat('off', 3); SetRun (true); GameTab(4); end;

All I did was remove NextPlayer(True); But the script will still work fine either way…

I think this will fix your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: My problems with surajd's wood smasher (please anyone reply) i am in need!
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Alright, here is how I get the script working.

-I set it up, using the script you posted, and changed the TreeType to ‘Tree’;

-I set the crosshairs, and brought the runescape client into focus. I logged in my player, and positioned him by some ‘Trees.’

-I pressed Control+Alt+R to start the script.

-The player manager form popped up, and I set the player I am using to ‘Active.’ I also set up his password, and NickName. The Location (Mine), and Skill (Iron) do not matter for this script, those are old settings. Notice how the Username is tutmi… and the NickName is three letters of it, that are not capitalized (utm.)

-This appeared in the SCAR debug box, showing that the script had succesfully started:

Loaded 7 users from chars.srl Wrote 7 users to chars.srl There is 1 active users Getting Axe and Handle colors... Axe colors: 595562 7631997 6119013 Handle color: 942465

-The script rotated the screen to Perfect North, and set my chats to Hide, Off, Off.

-The script then Set MY character to run, and started chopping down trees.

Here is my character:

The Setup I used for the script:

[code]Const
BenMouseBM = true; // Want to use BenLand100’s great groove? =D
TalkRandomly = true; // Talk Randomly or not?
TalkAboutSkill = true; // Types phrases about Woodcutting
AntiBanAB = true; // AntiBan functions or not?

RChat = 1; // Random-Talk time? EG: 2 for every 2 minutes
MouseSpeedMS = 11; // Change your Mouse-Speed, 11 works ok with BenMouse
WaitTime = 5000; // Waiting time between each Smash aka Chop
MaxWaitTime = 10000; // Max Waiting time between a Smash, aka Chop

TreeTypeTT = ‘Tree’; // Which Tree-Type are you Smashing? That is, the text which appears top-left of screeen (UPPER-CASE EG: Yew, Willow)
TTol = 10; // The Tolerance of finding the tree
HowManyDrops = 5; // Will Tree-Smash and after dropped the ammount of loads, will change player

Txt1 = ‘Tre’; // Enter any 3 letters on the text which appears top left! EG: “Yew” for Yew
Txt2 = ‘Cho’; // Enter any 3 letters on the text which appears top left! EG: “Cho” for Chop
Txt3 = ‘Dow’; // Enter any 3 letters on the text which appears top left! EG: “Dow” for Down

TColor1 = 4624512; // Tree Color 1
TColor2 = 3438696; // Tree Color 2
TColor3 = 870456; // Tree Color 3

LogColor = 6260645; // Color of the log you are Tree-Smashing in the inventory[/code]

Hope I could help.

P.S: I was using the official Runescape Client downloaded from there site.

Read full topic

item.title: My problems with surajd's wood smasher (please anyone reply) i am in need!
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

First of all, Nicknames are not the whole name.

You have the whole name, subtract one letter. Nicknames cannot include spaces, try 120, or something. I have never tried numbers, so I am not sure if these accounts will even work for solving randoms. That may actually be the problem, because I once had an accounts called 0 r l y 0, and whenever I ran a script, the nickname would havs spaces in it, and he would log out.

I hope that helps solve your problem!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

He already pm’d me, and I was able to fix his problem

Also, you usually get the canvas error if you have to many Bitmaps declared locally, you did not set the crosshairs, or with some scripts if you start logged out. In this case, he did not set the cross hairs correctly.
